summary: REQ-43 appears implemented by updating SITE_CONFIG.url to the new canonical domain. There is insufficient evidence in the provided diff summary that all old-domain references across the frontend were replaced (REQ-44) or that any admin-area user-facing URLs/guidance were updated/validated for the new domain (REQ-45). An additional URL utility was added that was not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update all internal links or any hardcoded absolute URLs throughout the frontend to use https://prasadenterprise-epm.caffeine.xyz/ and remove/replace remaining references to old/draft domains.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows only the canonical SITE_CONFIG.url update and does not show any concrete replacements/removals of old domain strings across frontend files. The included frontend-file-summaries.txt is descriptive metadata, not evidence of string replacements.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the admin area remains reachable on the new domain and any user-facing guidance/navigation pointing to the admin area uses the new domain (domain only; no path changes).
missing_requirements.reason: No changes related to admin routes, admin link construction, or user-facing admin URL guidance are shown in the diff summary. Only SITE_CONFIG.url and a new absoluteUrl utility are evidenced.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new absoluteUrl(path) utility for constructing absolute URLs from SITE_CONFIG.url.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requires updating configuration and replacing old domain references, but does not explicitly request introducing a new helper utility module.
